title: Momentus - Front End
description: User-facing front end for creating and revisiting memories based on geographical location. This project was inspired by the back-stories behind locks left on bridges in Paris. Built using Angular 1, Webpack, Karma, Mocha/ Chai

title: Momentus - Back End
description: RESTful API for front end, which allows users to create, edit, and delete memories. Sign-up, sign-in, and logout functionality built using basic auth and bearer auth. Built using Node.js, Mongo DB, Mocha/ Chai, AWS, and Express Middleware.

title: Narratus - Front End
description: Narratus is a collaborative writing application that allows a writer to author a round-robin short story, and allow other users to propose continuations. The original author will then curate the submissions, choosing the best [or most interesting] submissions, and appending them to the story. This front end was written with a teammate from the back end project

title: Narratus - Back End
description: Narrutus is a collaborative writing app that allows users to initiate a theme-based short story and for other users to contribute to the story sequentially. With this RESTful API, users can sign-up and sign-in, read and subscribe to short stories, create and moderate short stories, and contribute to other short stories. Users who do not sign-up with an account can only read stories.

title: The Tune Squad
description: Note: Deployed Site Currently Under Construction

title: Adventure Fellows
description: Turn-based adventure game built over four days as the culmination project of Code 201 course

title: About Me
description: This is my first project as a student. It includes a guessing game with hints and a list of my favorite recipes.
